Stephanie Fuda

Turning data chaos into organized, discoverable knowledge

Data Architecture & Engineering

With over 25 years of software engineering experience and modern data science expertise, I design scalable architectures and develop reliable pipelines that transform raw data into actionable insights, ensuring clean, validated data consistently flows from diverse sources into analytics-ready formats through robust ETL/ELT processes.

SEO/GEO Technical Consultant

Architecting discoverability strategies that bridge traditional search optimization and generative AI platforms. I design technical SEO foundations, implement structured data strategies, and optimize content architectures to ensure your digital presence surfaces effectively in both search engines and AI-powered answer systems.

Performance Engineering

Optimizing infrastructure for speed, efficiency, and reliability across web platforms and data systems. I architect high-performance solutions, implement caching strategies, eliminate bottlenecks, and ensure pipelines process data at scale while delivering exceptional user experiences that support your SEO and discoverability goals.

ML/AI Practitioner

Developing production-ready machine learning models and AI systems that drive business outcomes and automate decision-making. My focus spans from exploratory data analysis to deploying scalable ML pipelines that eliminate manual processes, uncover hidden patterns, and enable teams to focus on strategic initiatives.

Mathematician

Translating mathematical concepts into practical data science solutions. I leverage statistical modeling, optimization techniques, and analytical frameworks to solve complex business problems across industries through applied mathematics.

Technical Communicator

Bridging the gap between complex data science and stakeholder understanding by translating intricate concepts into clear documentation and actionable insights, ranging from executive dashboards to detailed technical specifications. This expertise extends to structuring content for maximum discoverability across search engines and AI platforms.
